items.title: Investor Duo Sells Avondale USPS Distribution Center for $89.8M
items.content_html: Westfield and RGA ReCap offloaded the Fairway Commerce Center in Avondale, a 450,000 square foot distribution center. The $89.8 million sale features a 10-year triple-net lease with the United States Postal Service. It represents one of the most significant industrial transactions in the West Valley submarket this year, according to JLL, which represented RGA. Invesco ... The post Investor Duo Sells Avondale USPS Distribution Center for $89.8M appeared first on Connect CRE .

items.title: In memoriam 2025: Remembering those we lost in New Jersey commercial real estate
items.content_html: We said goodbye in 2025 to several key figures in New Jersey’s commercial real estate community. Some were industry icons whose careers spanned more than half a century, but all were remembered by colleagues as valued friends and team members. Here is a look back at our coverage and the tributes that poured in from across the industry.

items.title: Stream Closes on Recap for 7 Texas Industrial Properties
items.content_html: Stream Realty Partners closed on the recapitalization of a portfolio of seven Class A industrial assets in Texas.  The industrial parks were developed by Stream and a foreign investor from 2021 to 2024 and comprise 4.4 million square feet of Class A industrial space catering to a variety of modern industrial users. The buildings offer flexible footprints from 25,000 square feet of shallow ... The post Stream Closes on Recap for 7 Texas Industrial Properties appeared first on Connect CRE .

items.title: Denton Seeks $280M Investment From Novartis To Grow Life Sciences
items.content_html: A Swiss pharmaceutical company has zeroed in on an empty facility in Denton, which it wants to turn into its latest U.S. manufacturing facility.
items.content_text: A Swiss pharmaceutical company has zeroed in on an empty facility in Denton, which it wants to turn into its latest U.S. manufacturing facility.

items.title: Oxford Picks Up 1M-SF of Austin-Area Retail Properties
items.content_html: Oxford Properties acquired Lakeline Plaza and Lakeline Village in Cedar Park, as well as Wolf Ranch Town Center (shown) in Georgetown. Washington Prime Group was the seller of a group of properties, which total over 1 million square feet. Oxford Properties partnered with Pine Tree for these deals. Pine Tree will operate the shopping centers on ... The post Oxford Picks Up 1M-SF of Austin-Area Retail Properties appeared first on Connect CRE .
